description: This Dart source file defines the Note class, representing a single text note with fields such as id, title, content, createdAt, and updatedAt. It includes methods for copying, serialization/deserialization with a database, generating snippets, and overrides for string representation and equality.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Represents a text note with metadata, supporting cloning, database conversion, and UI display snippets.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a modified copy of the current Note with overridden fields.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Converts the Note instance to a map suitable for SQLite database persistence.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Factory constructor to create a Note instance from a database row map.

methods.name: snippet
methods.description: Returns a short text snippet of the note's content for list display.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Provides a string representation of the Note instance.

methods.name: operator ==
methods.description: Overrides equality to compare note objects based on their fields.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Provides a hash code for the Note object based on its fields.
